column1: '''Radio Times 4 December 1953''' is an issue (Vol. 121, No. 1569) of ''Radio Times'', published on December 4, 1953. It includes the article "[[A Fourteenth-Century Romance]]" (p.9) by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], written in connection with the performance of Tolkien's translation of ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight (edition)
column2: Sir Gawain and the Green Knight]]''.<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
column3: Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''A Chronological Bibliography of the Writings of J.R.R. Tolkien''</ref>

column1: As regional editions of ''Radio Times'' were issued in different parts of the country to reflect local programming, Tolkien’s essay appears only in the non-regional or London edition of the issue.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' on TolkienBooks.net</ref>
